snippet: Rafael Nadal has added former player and fellow Spaniard Carlos Moya to his coaching team ahead of the 2017 season....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal has added former player and fellow Spaniard Carlos Moya to his coaching team ahead of the 2017 season.

headline.print_headline: Rafael Nadal Adds Carlos Moya to Coaching Team
headline.main: Rafael Nadal Adds Carlos Moya to Coaching Team
